4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

make-palette

Generic function

Summary

Returns a member of the class <palette>.

Signature

make-palette port #key => palette

Arguments

port
An instance of type <port>.

Values

palette
An instance of type <palette>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns a member of the class <palette>.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
